welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tampico, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Tampico has to offer.

restaurants.name: Los Curricanes
restaurants.description: Los Curricanes is a seafood restaurant located in Tampico.
